short_summary: Regional Individual Standing Offer for Personal Toiletries supply and delivery
description: Suplying and delivering Personal Toiletries to Correctional Services Canada (CSC) in Saskatchewan, Special transportation requirements includes heated trailers during winter months.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites bids for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to supply and deliver Personal Toiletry Items on an as-and-when-requested basis to the Saskatchewan Penitentiary in Prince Albert and the Regional Psychiatric Centre in Saskatoon.

#### Key Details

*   Contract Reference Number: WS4641354561
*   Solicitation Number: WS4641354561
*   Tender Publication Date: July 11, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: August 8, 2024, at 14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: September 1, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: August 31, 2025

#### Item Requirements

The CSC requires the supply and delivery of Personal Toiletry Items, which include necessary goods categorized under UN/SPSC category 53130000: Personal care products. 

#### Trade Agreements

Trade agreements applicable to this tender include:

*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Delivery

Deliveries will be made to:

*   Saskatchewan Penitentiary in Prince Albert, Saskatchewan
*   Regional Psychiatric Centre in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan

#### Contracting Entity Information

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage in Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada will manage the contract.

#### Contact Information

Elsa Olivos (elle-la / she-her) from PSPC can be reached at elsa.olivos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for further information regarding this tender.

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents are available for download at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20294146?extsite=MjAyOTQxNDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. 814 beliefs.
